#summary Syntax to reference properties in ModelPattern annotations (RFC 2)

== RFC 2 ==
= Property expression language =

  # _Simple property_: "." for embedded object's properties and related entities separator
  Example with entity Customer:
{{{
firstName
}}}
{{{
address.street
}}}

  # _"To many" association_: "[]" postfixed
  Example with entity Customer:
{{{
invoices[]
}}}
  # _"To one" association_: "->" prefixed
  Example with entity Invoice:
{{{
->customer.lastName
}}}
  Example from Item:
{{{
->product.name
}}}

Complex example from entity Customer:
{{{
invoices[]items[]->product.name
}}}
